attributes.action: inform the public of the cost and effect of the Government’s present military excursions and to inform the public of the proportions of cost the banking crisis as a result of banking incompetences has caused in comparison to the costs to the economy of the ‘wars’ on terror.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
USA pulled out of Vietnam because they were at the time on the verge of bankruptcy as a direct result of the cost of the war they were continuing and ultimately lost. 
Is the present situation the UK is involved in similar? Has there been a lack of transparency in the recent press releases and public information?
